readme: # nise (偽) [![npm version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/nise.svg?style=flat)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/nise) [![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/sinonjs/nise.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/sinonjs/nise) [![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/sinonjs/nise/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/sinonjs/nise) fake XHR and Server Documentation: http://sinonjs.github.io/nise/ ## Backers Support us with a monthly donation and help us continue our activities. [[Become a backer](https://opencollective.com/sinon#backer)] ## Sponsors Become a sponsor and get your logo on our README on GitHub with a link to your site. [[Become a sponsor](https://opencollective.com/sinon#sponsor)] ## Licence nise was released under [BSD-3](LICENSE)
